wikipedia_page.main: Martin Hodge (born 4 February 1959 in Southport, Lancashire) is an English former professional footballer. He played as a goalkeeper for Plymouth Argyle, Everton, Sheffield Wednesday, Leicester City, Hartlepool United and Rochdale. His career lasted from 1977 to 1996 during which time he played 602 league and cup matches.
